import borders from'assets/theme-dark/base/borders';// Material Dashboard 2 React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from'assets/theme-dark/functions/pxToRem';var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var cardMedia={styleOverrides:{root:{borderRadius:borderRadius.xl,margin:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," ").concat(pxToRem(16)," 0")},media:{width:'auto'}}};export default cardMedia;
